I helped with organization of the [Organizational Communication Mini-Conference at Northwestern University](https://sites.northwestern.edu/ocmc24/) from September 27th to 29th, 2024

Gantt chart of some sort with all the previous organizers

![](hosts.png)

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv("ocmc24.csv") |> 
  group_by(university) |> 
  mutate(max_year = max(year)) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  mutate(university = fct_reorder(university, max_year))

university_colors <- df |> 
  select(university, color) |> 
  unique() |> 
  rename(value = university) |> 
  tibble::deframe()

df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = university, color = university), family="Roboto")+ 
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1988, linetype = "dashed", color = "grey")+ 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5, size = 5)+ geom_line(alpha = 0.5, size = 5)+ 
  geom_text(aes(label = university), x = 2025, hjust = 0, 
            family="Roboto", size = 12)+ 
  ggtitle("Who hosted Organizational Communication Mini-Conference?")+ 
  geom_text(x = 1986, y = 1, label = "OCMC was founded at the UIUC in 1988", 
            color = "grey", angle = 90, hjust = 0, 
            family="Roboto", size = 10)+ 
  theme_minimal()+ 
  scale_color_manual(values = university_colors)+ 
  theme(
    legend.position = "none", 
    axis.text.y=element_blank(), 
    axis.title.x=element_blank(), 
    axis.title.y=element_blank(), 
    panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(), 
    panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(), 
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(), 
    text=element_text(size=24, family="Roboto"), 
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.25))+ 
  scale_x_continuous(
    breaks = c(seq(1990,2024,5), 2024), 
    limits = c(1980, 2086)) -> g

g
```
